title: so this woman at my writers workshop said she wrote about 'feminist superheroes.'
body:
and by woman i mean actually one of the adult writers, probs in her 30s

now when she said that i was kinda like "wait what."

but this made me wonder

"hmm, i wonder what kind of feminist these superheroes are."

what do you guys think?

i could ask her what her superheroes portray

maybe
